title: Hua Jianghu Richang Pian
synopsis: The "Hua Jianghu " series of relaxing small theaters update wonderful short animations from time to time. There are extra plots that you can't see in the feature film, and there are funny daily routines with big brains.(translated from douban)
background: You can only watch this anime through their official app.

title: Koushui Sanguo
synopsis: "Koushui Sanguo" is a black and white stop motion animation produced by Fulimiao Studio. The style is cute, the dubbing is sharp, and it is accompanied by various ways of killing. Each episode gives you a different feeling! The Three Kingdoms of Saliva is a cartoon presented in a funny and relaxed form, and the history of the Three Kingdoms is expressed in various funny forms.(translated from douban)

title: Koushui Sanguo Di Er Ji
synopsis: "Koushui Sanguo" is a black and white stop motion animation produced by Fulimiao Studio. The style is cute, the dubbing is sharp, and it is accompanied by various ways of killing. Each episode gives you a different feeling! The Three Kingdoms of Saliva is a cartoon presented in a funny and relaxed form, and the history of the Three Kingdoms is expressed in various funny forms.(translated from douban)

title: Na Nian Na Tu Naxie Shi
synopsis: The first season of the play mainly tells the story of a group of rabbits and other creatures that happened on the blue star. Taking the rabbit as the main perspective, the story starts with the rise and fall of the rabbit family, the ancient flower grower, to the rabbits defeating the bald and founding their own country[8], to fighting against egoists such as eagle sauce and teddy bears, and then to Later, after suffering a series of events such as taking off and rising.(translated from baidu baike)

title: Na Nian Na Tu Naxie Shi season2
synopsis: After hard work, the rabbit finally overcome all difficulties and established a new flower planter. However, the rabbit suffered from the isolation of the eagle sauce and the big bear, and had to make friends with the simple hippos. With the economic and military assistance of the rabbit, the hippo represented by Uncle Tanhei has achieved considerable military development, and the rabbit has finally established a foothold in the Third World. At the same time, the relationship between Rabbit and Teddy Bear continued to deteriorate, and armed conflict broke out on Zhenbao Island. No permanent friends, only permanent interests. Once regarded as Kou Yu, the rabbit and Yingjiang test each other and finally establish diplomatic relations. In order to contain the power of the bears, Yingjiang assisted the flower growers to return to the United Nations, and provided great support for the export of weapons. 　　The flower planter is led by the rabbit, step by step towards prosperity...(translated from douban)

details.Japanese: 那年那兔那些事 第二季

title: Na Nian Na Tu Naxie Shi Fanwai Pian
synopsis: The complete version of the North Korean chapter that did not appear in the first season, the author's grievances are relieved here, and with a happy and grateful heart, I will once again take you to revisit the loveliest people. (translated from douban)

details.Japanese: 那年那兔那些事儿 番外篇

title: Na Nian Na Tu Naxie Shi season3
synopsis: This film tells the story of a group of rabbits being locked up and accompanying many third world hippos, striving to survive in the cold war between Keele’s eternal life and the noise. And return to the world stage, and rebuild the old story with Yingchan Maoxiong. (translated from douban)

details.Japanese: 那年那兔那些事 第三季

title: Na Nian Na Tu Naxie Shi season4
synopsis: The historical shuttle bus flows back again from modern time and space to the Xinhai Revolution period (about 1912). The rabbit who first awakened to new ideas and the bald man who first lived in the flower planter went through their own separation and reunion, until the bald man forcibly triggered the "4·12" After the counter-revolutionary coup, he was determined to part ways. We have been hesitating, we have been lost, but we have never flinched!(translated from baidu baike)

details.Japanese: 那年那兔那些事儿 第四季

title: Na Nian Na Tu Naxie Shi season5
synopsis: This film tells how a group of rabbits from a flower grower became poor and white. Through their own hard work and struggle, they bred their own big mushrooms and developed their own big mushrooms to become one of the five strongest gangsters of Blue Star. story. (translated from douban)

title: Ludou Wa
synopsis: Mung Bean Frog is a domestic humorous animated short film, and there is also a comic work of the same name. The main characters are Mung Bean Frog LEON, Crab BLOO, Pink Frog LEE, Hen SABON and so on. The mung bean frog LEON has a very lofty ambition for it, which is to make friends all over the world and find their own happiness. But the future is long, and it is not a perfect world, but a real life. (translated from baidu baike)

title: Mo Jing Lieren
synopsis: "Magic Crystal Hunter" is an animated series of juvenile passionate action adventures with an overhead view of the world. It is an animation work specially created for the topic of youth growth. In a fantasy world where humans and elves and dragons coexist under the "magic crystal" energy system, in order to realize the dream of becoming a magic crystal hunter, several teenagers are looking for the meaning of freedom and love. , And eventually become the true brave who understands tolerance and the preciousness of life and the best friend of the dragon beast. (translated from douban)

title: Mo Jing Lieren season4
synopsis: The 7,000-year-old Sag continent continues to be turbulent. Qian Rui, a small tailor who is determined to be the greatest magic crystal hunter, is constantly involved in the whirlpool of conspiracy in the magic crystal academy. The Rainbow Bridge, which symbolizes energy balance, showed ominous signs, and the gold crystal suddenly shattered. This time, the center of the storm points to the Golden Ling Palace, which represents golden glory! The price of getting closer to the truth step by step is actually at the expense of my trusted friends and mentors! Where are Qian Rui and his friends who are wandering in despair... (translated from baidu baike)

title: Mo Jing Lieren 5th season
synopsis: The civil war in the Magic Crystal Academy reignited, the dark forces struck again, and the Magic Crystal Youth League regrouped, and they will face an even more arduous and dangerous challenge. In the face of the crisis, can the Demon Crystal Youth Group break through again, and whether Qian Rui can put on the battle robe of the Demon Crystal Hunter and lead everyone to the rescue... (translated from douban)

title: Hu Yao Xiao Hongniang Juchang Ban: Xiasha
synopsis: According to the records of classical novels, there are demons in the world, demons will fall in love with people, demons live for thousands of years, human life span is limited, man is dead, demons live. People will reincarnate, but after reincarnation, they don’t remember the love of the previous life. If the demon is infatuated, go to the fox demon to purchase a service so that the reincarnated person can recall the love of the previous life. This is how the role of fox demon matchmaker was born. The work mainly tells the fox demon whose career is a matchmaker...(translated from douban)

details.Japanese: 狐妖小红娘剧场版：下沙

title: Hu Yao Xiao Hongniang Fanwai
synopsis: The story is about the writer of this comics and the character in the anime.

title: Quanzhi Fashi
synopsis: The protagonist wakes up and the world changes dramatically. Familiar high school teaches magic, telling everyone to become an excellent magician. The world of advocating science has become advocating magic, but there are the same teachers who treat themselves as scumbags, the same classmates with strange eyes, the same struggling father from the bottom of society, the same pure and non-blood sister who can't walk... (translated from douban)

title: Fei Ren Zai Zhi Shenxian Ye Ai Chi
synopsis: Inhuman X Pizza Hut Custom Fan! Fairies and monsters, gourmet summons! More than 2 billion clicks on the entire network of comics are animated! It’s great to eat chicken wings during overtime—September said, patted his chubby belly.(translated from douban)

title: Huli Lie Na
synopsis: The long animation "Fox Lena" adapted from Goethe's long poem "Leena Fox" shows the court struggles of the animal kingdom in the Middle Ages. The main clues are the struggles between the fox Lena and the bear Bren and the old wolf Isangelin. , Lena finally liberated from the rule of the feudal kingdom and won freedom. (translated from douban)

title: Diao Long Ji
synopsis: A long time ago, in the depths of Diancang Mountain, Dali, Yunnan, in the mysterious and gloomy Black Dragon Pool, there was an evil sow dragon hidden. Every three years, it rushes to the world, calling for rain, making waves, and harming the people. Even in the normal season, once someone approaches the Black Dragon Pool, they will be killed by the sow dragon. Master Yang, a carpenter of the Bai ethnic group, passed by with his son Qijin. When Qijin was looking for water for his father, he was dragged into the Black Dragon Pool by a sow. The grieving Master Yang heard that the nearby villagers were suffering from the poison, so he decided to get rid of the sow dragon. He and a pair of little brothers and sisters whose parents were dead both carve the wooden dragon carefully, preparing it to fight the sow dragon. The sow dragon is cunning and versatile. Can Master Yang and the others get rid of this vicious beast? (translated from douban)

title: Bijiasuo Yu Gongniu

title: Hui Yao Weiba De Lang
synopsis: Let's talk about a wolf that fell into a trap, exhausting deception and threats, trying to get the old goat to save it. However, the old goat recognized it as a ferocious wolf from its bluff and hard tail, and was not deceived. (translated from douban)

title: Tai Yi Xian Mo Lu Zhi Ling Fei Ji II

title: Xin Didao Zhan
synopsis: In 1940, the gunshots of Japanese aggression broke the peaceful campus life of Mai Bao and his friends. At the critical moment when the villagers were captured, the teacher was tortured, and the eight roads were seriously injured, Mai Bao and the others seemed to have grown up overnight. They used the tunnels that connected villages and villages to communicate with each other. The whole was embarrassed. In order to rescue the villagers, Mai Bao was unfortunately trapped in a cell and passed by the god of death many times. In the process of fighting the enemy's wits and courage, Mai Bao not only managed to escape the danger, but also rescued the villagers by digging tunnels. The desperate Japanese soldiers fought fierce tunnel battles with their fellow villagers. In the face of the criss-crossing and winding battle tunnel network, the Japanese soldiers failed repeatedly. Finally, at a critical moment of the battle, Mai Bao risked his life to light the fuse and detonate the arsenal to wipe out the Japanese soldiers in one fell swoop.(translated from douban)

title: Xin Didao Zhan 2 Zhi FUzi Qibing
synopsis: In order to sabotage the Japanese conspiracy, Dad Mai and his son pretended to be large and small workers and lurked in the Japanese headquarters. One after another, thrilling opponent scenes, and funny scenes of laughter and laughter are slowly being staged. For the homeland, for the motherland, the prelude to the tunnel warfare was opened... (translated from douban)

title: Shuihu Zuqiu Zhongji Ban
synopsis: The story continues after Gao Qi left the imperial city after his defeat. There is no news. The Water Margin football team replaced the Royal Football Club as the Song Dynasty national team. Song Jiang was named the crown lieutenant of the dynasty. The Liangshan hero entered another world, fame and fortune. 　　 Material desires are corrupt, and the Water Margin football players are no exception. They are rich and honored every night, absent from training, and fail to observe the discipline of the team, so that they lose consecutive games. Song Jiang also feels worried in his eyes. The more he trains, the more he can resist. In addition, a group of Water Margin football players like to play tricks on the emperor on weekdays, and the people in the court are also worthless for the emperor. The situation of Water Margin football is not as stable and optimistic on the outside... 　　 　　 Time is like an arrow. The four-year "China Cup" football match began to accept applications. Song Jiang stepped up to train the members of the Water Margin football team, which intensified the conflict between the brothers...(translated from douban)

title: Bihua Li De Gushi
synopsis: The film is based on the three murals of "Overcoming Drought, Flood and Wind" in Anhui farmers' paintings, telling the story of farmers overcoming natural disasters and winning agricultural harvests. Although the film has the exaggeration of the square satellites unique to the Great Leap Forward period, such as the grain piled like a hill, a pepper is carried by two people, and a cabbage is pulled by a cart, it infinitely magnifies the concept of man conquering the sky, but the creator can paint farmers The characteristics of simplicity, childishness, and exaggeration of humanity, creative integration and use, coordination and unity of style, are also innovative in style and style, and have gained certain experience in the creation of realistic themes in national forms. (translated from douban)

title: Hou Wang Chuan
synopsis: As a child, Asi lived carefree under the protection of his parents, but after the invasion of alien long-tailed monkeys, his father was killed by a new generation of monkey king Guli, and he was mercilessly exiled from Gongka Mountain, he gradually grew up. As a new monkey king with strong personality and great ambition, he not only found true love in the Pala Valley, but also returned to Gongka Mountain as the new monkey king, opening a new chapter in the Gongka Mountain monkey group... (translated from douban)

background: This anime aired in 1988.This anime aired  at the CCTV Spring Festival Gala in 1988,

title: Mei Jian Chi
synopsis: The anime is a puppet cartoon, adapted from the historical legend of "Brow-foot ruler is revenge for the parents". The legend has many records in history books, and its content is similar. "Brow Ruler"). 　　The sword master Gan Jiang and Mo Xie's apprentice Heizi killed the sacred bull of King Chu during a bullfight. King Chu was furious and ordered him to be executed. The traitorous officials slandered him. King Chu decided to use Heizi's life to threaten the general and Mo Xie to cast an invisible sword for him. Ganjiang and Mo Xie spent three years of work to create two invisible swords for the king of Chu, one female and one male. However, the generals who had a premonition only gave one of them, and both husband and wife died tragically. When the king of Chu sent troops to chase Heizi, Xiaomei (another disciple of Gan Jiang and Mo Xie) and Xiao Meijian Chi (the son of Gan Jiang and Mo Xie), the three managed to escape. Meijianzhi grew to 15 years old, and learned the truth about the tragic death of her parents from her younger sister, and decided to avenge her parents and the people of the world.(translated from douban)

title: OK
synopsis: The story tells that a parrot who learns to beak learns the phrase "OK" and sends it a bite to eat. Later, there was unpleasantness at the banquet, and the parrot still shouted OK (good!). The consequences can be imagined... (translated from douban)

title: Wo Cuole
synopsis: Beibei is a naughty kid who likes to scribble. No, as soon as the sanitation worker painted the public walls white, he took out his pen and drew a humpbacked old man and a naughty monkey. While appreciating his work satisfactorily, Beibei let a flying object hit his head. It turned out that there was a lively scene next to him, so he hurried over. 　　 But there are too many people watching the excitement, and Beibei can’t get in no matter how crowded, she’s too tired to watch. While pushing an uncle who was holding her daughter to look at the strangeness, the little girl turned her head and shouted "It's annoying" at him. This annoyed him. He grabbed the paintbrush and drew a turtle on the little girl. What he didn't expect was that the tortoise came back to life, and bit his finger with one bite, and he couldn't shake it no matter what.(translated from douban)

title: Daozhi
synopsis: Inversion, as the name implies, is to reverse the order or relationship. People admire the beautiful shapes, postures and vigorous vitality presented to us by other creatures, while cruelly taking everything from them, human greed is forcing themselves to become numb. The right of mankind above all else will eventually harm mankind. (translated from douban)
background:
Film animation short film, 7 minutes, produced by Beijing Science Film in 1990 and won the Beijing Science Film Excellent Film Award in the same year. It also made the film's author won the title of Advanced Worker for the fifth consecutive year.
(translated from douban)

title: Songshu Yu Yao Shu
synopsis: In the deep mountain and old forest where the Blang people have lived for generations, there is a huge rock. Legend has it that the seed of the devil is under the rock. Once it comes out, it will harm the world. Therefore, the people never dared to approach it for half a step. Until one day, when the opportunity was ripe, after the lightning and thunder, the devil's seeds took root and sprouted, arbitrarily growing, and in a blink of an eye it became a huge scarlet tree. The branches and vines of the demon tree seemed to have life. They spread arbitrarily, eroding the surrounding flowers and trees, harming local people and animals, and destroying the village of the Blang people. The little girl Yuduo remembered her grandfather's instructions and desperately protected the village's fire. The villagers and animals finally came to a habitat. They accidentally discovered that the demon tree would sleep at night, so they decided to cut down the evil spirit. But the demon tree is not afraid of being cut and burned. The brave little squirrel volunteered to find the demon tree’s weakness... (translated from douban)

title: Jimu Ji
synopsis: The mother chicken gave birth to 7 chicks. These 7 chicks have strange shapes, but the appearances of these 7 chicks are common shapes in geometric figures. They are: cone, cylinder, cube, cuboid, trapezoid. , Sphere, triangle. 　　 These 7 chicks, whenever they encounter difficulties, they are very united and very brave. They will come up with different methods according to different situations, and they will also form various tools to overcome difficulties to overcome difficulties and defeat the enemy. (translated from douban)

title: Shi Gou Chuanzhang
synopsis: No synopsis information has been added to this title. Help improve our database by adding a synopsis here.

title: Gushu Xin Shuo
synopsis: It consists of four short stories: 　　1, "what the eye sees". A man who is obsessed with money, grabs money and forgets about it. 　　2, "Thief in the Heart". The suspicious neighbor's child steals his own axe, but it is subjective. 　　 3. "Fortunately and unfortunately". The two acrobats have similar skills, but the results are opposite, but it is determined by the monarch's mood. 　　 4. "Fish and integrity." Those who love fish refuse to eat fish for the sake of rejecting favor and keeping integrity. (translated from douban)

title: Dongxi Nanbei
synopsis: The film exaggerates the interpersonal relationship of comparison, suspiciousness, selfishness, cruelty, helplessness, despair, and the author's pessimism and worry about the future. (translated from douban)

title: Lizi Gou He Xiangjiao Hu
synopsis: No synopsis information has been added to this title. Help improve our database by adding a synopsis here.

title: Bailu He Gui
synopsis: Once upon a time, a little turtle was eating a little fish, but was snatched by a flying egret. The tortoise was so weak that it bit off a few feathers of the egret. The egret pecks the turtle angrily, but the tortoise retracts its head and tail hands and feet into the hard shell, unable to peck. The egret flips and pecks in every possible way, but it can't hurt the turtle. The tortoise braked with silence, waited for work with ease, seized the opportunity to bite the egret's neck, and cleverly won this protracted battle. (translated from douban)

title: Youmiao
synopsis: No synopsis information has been added to this title. Help improve our database by adding a synopsis here.

title: Wai Mao Zhan Zaosheng
synopsis: The protagonist of the film, Yimao, finally defeated the constantly changing noise monster in various ways, and got him 100 points of complacency, but he did not expect that there is another kind of noise that was ignored. (translated from douban)
background: This anime Won the Shanghai National Animation Exhibition Special Award and Beijing Science Film Excellent Film Award in 1991.

title: Guai Zai
synopsis: This film is adapted from "Strange Stories from a Lonely Studio-White Lotus Sect". Taoist priests who can master magic go on a long journey. Before going out, apprentices should look at the paper boats in the water. The Taoist who was sailing on the sea encountered a storm. When he returned home, he found that the disciple's guards made him push the paper boat that he was using. The Taoist scolded the disciple and left. The Taoist's wife had an adulterous affair with his disciple while the Taoist was traveling, but the Taoist didn't even go far. He stood at the door watching the adulterer and the adulteress. The cries of the little daughter led to his wife and disciple. This time the Taoist priest did not let the disciple off. He turned the disciple into a pig. What is even more frightening is that the pig was put on the table and turned into dishes... (translated from douban)

title: Qianting Zongdongyuan
synopsis: On this day, Daoge instructor arranged a task for the underwater motor boats and two trained submarines-Beibei and Ali, that is, first put the sea cucumbers back into the coral pile, and then find a suitable box and go to the aircraft. The eel that Susie had brought back to the training base. In the beginning, the three little friends messed up almost everything in order to compete for the person in charge. Later they realized that they were wrong, so they worked together and finally completed the task. The submarine Beibei and Ali graduated that day. When they graduated, they recalled the bits and pieces of their submarine training: diving to 20 meters to save the instructor, and swapping jobs with your mother... This not only made them understand The principle of doing things has also made them gain valuable friendship.(translated from douban)

title: Qianting Zongdongyuan 2
synopsis: Ali and Beibei are both excellent scientific research submarines. They are a very good pair of partners. In "Submarine Mobilization", they have completed many trainings and tasks together. This time, what will the two little guys face? What kind of mysterious and interesting challenge? 　　 The famous marine researcher and underwater archaeologist Dr. Su Hong owns four imitations of the ancient medals hidden in the deep sea by Pirates of the Caribbean. The four medals represent wisdom, courage, friendship and justice. On this day, Dr. Su Hong convened Ali and Beibei and explained that if they can complete a task, they will receive a medal. If they can collect all four medals, the little guys will be invited to Quanzhou to participate in the opening of the Oceanographic Museum. Ceremony, and will receive a mysterious reward from the doctor, which makes the little submarines excited and eager to try! Ali and Beibei, together with small partners such as sea motorboat frogs, pet monkey Taotao, sea one-legged planing boat stone, etc., united and cooperated without fear of difficulties, and successfully completed the search for the Crown of Egypt in the Mediterranean and the wreck of the Arctic Ocean , The task of searching for stone slabs in the ancient Arabian Sea city and integrating the protection of sunken ship cultural relics, successively received four medals awarded by the doctor and returned to Quanzhou. After a thrilling search, he found the anchor of Zheng He’s sunken ship and gave this precious cultural relic as a gift to the upcoming The opening of the Quanzhou Oceanographic Museum. 　　 The small submarines have fulfilled all the tasks assigned to them by Dr. Su Hong. Dr. Su Hong fulfilled her promise. She arranged for the opening ceremony of the Quanzhou Ocean Museum to set off fireworks in the image of a small submarine as a surprise reward. 　　Through the experience of ocean exploration, the small submarines have not only become more mature, brave, united, and cooperative, but also learned about the long-standing marine civilization, learned the protection of marine cultural relics and many other useful knowledge, thus becoming true submarine heroes!(translated from douban)

title: Qianting Zongdongyuan 3: Caihong Baozang
synopsis: 300 years ago, coastal residents could not bear the oppression and raid of foreign colonial invaders and formed pirates to fight against colonists. The pirates snatched the treasures of the colonists and buried them in a mysterious sea. Legend has it that the mountain of treasures shines and turns into a beautiful rainbow. From then on, the pirates and their treasures are known as rainbows. Bobo, a beaver who claims to be a descendant of the rainbow pirate (voiced by Xie Yuanzhen), weaves the legend into a story and tells the inhabitants of the sea. As a result, it attracts the seahorse family who cannot find treasure and the vicious and mysterious one-eyed shark (voiced by Tan Mantang). In a critical moment, Bobo was rescued by the small submarine Ali (voiced by Fan Churong). They brought the small submarine Beibei (voiced by Hong Haitian) and the Seahorse family on a journey to find the treasure of the rainbow. 　　 At the end of the vast sea, what will be waiting for these adventurers?(translated from douban)

title: Qianting Zongdongyuan 4: Zhangyu Qiyu Ji
synopsis: Octopus Paul (voiced by Jiang Ke) was chased by his creditors for owing a huge sum of money. In desperation, he could only take his family and fled to the bottom of the sea, living a life of hiding in Tibet. By chance, Paul met a one-eyed shark (voiced by Tan Mantang). Under the instigation and provocation of the one-eyed shark, Paul actually embarked on the road of gambling, and has won many battles. He became a dazzling star overnight, Paul It also became arrogant. 　　 Paul's son Xiaobao (voiced by Li Ye) accidentally broke the one-eyed shark's conspiracy. It turned out that all the results of the game were controlled by the one-eyed shark. At the beginning, Paul did not believe what his son said and thought it was nonsense. However, as time went on, under the tireless persuasion of Xiaobao and a group of friends, Paul finally saw the facts and returned to the right way. (translated from douban)

details.Japanese: 潜艇总动员4：章鱼奇遇记

title: Qianting Zongdongyuan 5: Shiguang Bao He
synopsis: The small submarine Ali went to the depths of the sea to perform missions and encountered an unprecedented accident. The little shark Meisha refuses to be a submarine king like his father's one-eyed shark, and she dreams of becoming a submarine hero like Ali. The mysterious treasure box she got accidentally changed her father's one-eyed shark back to his childhood appearance. When the treasure box disappeared strangely, a mysterious monster appeared in the underwater playground... 　　 In order to explore the mystery to save the underwater world, the small submarine took the super cute animals on a magical treasure hunt adventure. (translated from douban)

title: Qianting Zongdongyuan 6: Haidi Liang Wanli
synopsis: There have been successive incidents of mysterious sea monsters destroying merchant ships around the world, causing panic and rumors that the ocean is facing disaster. The submarine Ali decided to gather partners to track the "sea monster", but found that the "sea monster" is a technological submarine that uses "environmental protection" as an excuse to carry out evil plans. In order to solve these mysteries, Ali and his friends used the knowledge they learned to start a 20,000-mile roaming expedition under the sea. (translated from douban)

details.Japanese: 潜艇总动员6：海底两万里

title: Qianting Zongdongyuan: Wai Xing Baobei Jihua
synopsis: Under the propaganda and leadership of Mayor Seal and Professor Penguin, the undersea society agreed with the "alien harmful theory" view. The little submarine Ali accidentally met Wugu, a little alien who came to the earth to play but separated from his parents. Through understanding, Ali found that the aliens were not only not dangerous, but also very friendly. To help Wugu find his parents, Ali and his friend Beibei embarked on an adventurous journey... (translated from douban)

details.Japanese: 潜艇总动员：外星宝贝计划

title: Da Tang Fengyun
synopsis: A family selling steamed buns lives in a quiet and peaceful village. The mother and son depend on each other for life. Because of her passion for selling steamed buns, her mother named her son Maibao. Mai Bao has a round head and a round brain. He likes to show off but is timid, but he is a good boy with a good nature. 　　 When King Yang Guangji usurped the throne, the general escorted the princess Yuanzi and Yuxi to flee. In order to cover up, Yuanzi disguised as an ugly girl and came to the school where Mai Bao was located. The two soon became good friends. 　　 One day, while my friends were playing, Mai Bao rescued a dragon among the insects, the fire dragon, who spoke human and spiritual. His kindness touched the "Firefly Dragon" and guided him to the cave to open the dusty seal of Xiang Yu for a century. Mai Bao opened the seal, awakening Xiang Yu, who had been sleeping for a hundred years, and Mai Bao became the only person who could possess Xiang Yu's soul. It's just that Xiang Yu doesn't like Mai Bao's lack of heroic figure, and Mai Bao has always disagreed with Xiang Yu because of his timidity and fear. 　　 And Yang Guang’s minions tracked down the whereabouts of the little princess and Yu Xi, and broke into the small village where Mai Bao was. 　　 Xiao Yuanzi’s friend, Xiao Tang Wang, is wit and brave, and is very dissatisfied with Yang Guang’s tyranny, but the strength of the two sides is very different. With the help of Mai Bao, Xiao Yuanzi and their partners, they united and started a battle of wits with Yang Guang. The friends encountered many difficulties and even faced the test of life and death. Wheat Bao kept his mother's teachings in mind, and used Xiang Yu to teach him martial arts like a hero to solve problems for the people and finally won the victory...(translated from douban)

title: Da Tang Fengyun2
synopsis: This story is based on the character of Mai Bao’s mother and child who loves troubles but is cute, confused but lively, timid but righteous, and saves the country and the people. The core values are the heart and soul, and the plot with tears in laughter is used to make fun of laughter. The exciting rhythm presents a magical and funny legend. (translated from douban)

title: Milu Wang
synopsis: In the world of "The Elk King", the story takes place in the three races of humans, monsters and elk. Compared with the naive greedy panda Abao, the protagonist of the movie Elk Princess Yoyo takes a gentle and innocent route. She becomes a girl because she eats an unknown fairy grass, and therefore has the trick of "lost legs", looking for the elk king. In the process, began a romantic love with a human prince. (translated from douban)

title: Milu Chuanqi
synopsis: In ancient times, humans and animals lived in harmony, and the elk was regarded as a divine beast. The elk princess Youyou and the elk king lead her compatriots to live freely in the beautiful wetlands and mountain forests. Legend has it that the deer king’s horn has a magical power that can make the dreams of those who get it come true. In order to obtain the king deer horns, the young prince and the insidious wizard led troops to capture the king deer in the forest. At the same time, Aoki, the leader of Haiqima, also led his comrades to ambush in the lake below the mountain. Youyou, a rebellious character, accidentally ate an unknown grass and turned into a human. He fell in love with Prince Chan at first sight. In the end, Chan and Youyou fought the wizard and Aoki together and defeated them. (translated from douban)

title: Yu Shi
synopsis: The film tells the story of ordinary high school student Lu Fan who came to another world in an accident, and got acquainted with the beautiful girl Ye Shan and the powerful mouse Adi in this world. In order to return to the real world, they competed with the Hell Legion in this world for the rainstone with special power, and paid a heavy price. In the end, when Lu Fan returned to the real world, he had a new understanding of life. (translated from douban)

title: Mayi
synopsis: In an ordinary metropolis, office workers are thrown into the battle of squeezing the bus to and from get off work, sweating on everyone, so helpless. In a residential building unit in a residential area, a dishevelled man was searching for a job online. The room was messy and even cockroaches appeared. At the same time, the man's wife had just gotten out of the crowded bus, and she tried every means to protect the cake in her hands. When I got home, the phone rang on its own, but my husband Gu Ruo ignored it. The woman hurriedly answered the phone, her mother was on the other end of the phone. The old man greeted his son-in-law's job search, and told the couple to pay attention to the hygiene of the room. The woman was absent-minded and hung up the phone hastily. She was lying on the bed tiredly, but at this moment, she found a lot of ants in the bottle under the bed. When she finally cleared the bottle, she returned to the kitchen and found that the delicious cake attracted more ants. 　　 Ordinary people, nightmare in the evening... (translated from douban)

title: Yanwei Die
synopsis: This animated short film tells about a warm and bumpy rescue journey between a pair of good friends, the fat panda BoBo and the cock ToTo. ToTo accidentally ate a poisoned apple and was unconscious, and ToTo, who was weak on BoBo's back, hit the road. Along the way, they met the frog princess who jumped off the cliff and the sword practice boy who was sent to the cross. When they came to the tramway station, they faced the terrifying death Gobi. After several obstacles, they finally came to the strange Qilinyu Town. However, he was poisoned by the evil rat race. The dying ToTo was dying. Thanks to the fairy guiding them to take a flying machine to the unicorn island in the middle of the sea, to find the prince riding a pig and holding a wooden sword to detoxify. Can ToTo escape the danger and live a happy life with BoBo again?(translated from douban)
background:
This anime won The 6th Animation Academy Awards of Beijing Film Academy "Jury Award" and "Most Popular Award" and
OCAA Golden Dragon Award "Best Animated Short Film Award" and
Golden Flash Awards Annual "Best Online Animation Award"

title: Shanshan De Hongxing
synopsis: The story takes place in Liuxi Village in 1937. The cheerful boy Pan Dongzi's father is a Red Army soldier. By chance, Pan Dongzi met the captain of the Red Army Red Guard, Xiu Zhu. The handsome and brave Xiu Zhu was a little Pan. The most admired place in Dongzi's heart. Under the protection of the Red Guards, the villagers of Liuxi Village lived a happy life. However, the Red Guards could not stay here forever. In the end, Pan Dongzi's father embarked on the Long March journey with them. 　　 As soon as the Red Guards left, the traitor Hu Hansan led his minions and began to dominate the village, and the villagers returned to the deep waters. In an accident, Pan Dongzi's mother unfortunately sacrificed to protect the villagers. This is the first time Pan Dongzi has tasted the pain and helplessness of life. However, Pan Dongzi didn't let this down, but kept striving for self-improvement, and eventually grew up into a mature and reliable young man.(translated from douban)

title: Zhen Gongfu Zhi Aoyun Zai Wojia
synopsis: The story begins with the encounter between "Brother" Xiaodong and British journalist Annie. One forgot to pay for a taxi, and one forgot to take the bag. In the process of asking for money and repaying the package, Xiaodong accidentally bumped into the Olympic imitation show. The street director recommended him to be a torchbearer, but he attracted competition from his friends pumpkin. It turned out that Xiaodong's younger sister made a poisonous oath with Pumpkin. As long as Pumpkin wins, she will marry him. Pumpkin hears the words like a stimulant and is determined to compete with Xiaodong. At this moment, Annie approached Xiaodong to find the Olympic theme. Xiaodong's girlfriend Beibei mistakenly thought that she had empathized with her and became jealous, seeing an emotional crisis about to break out. Anne was dumbfounded by the various unique skills of old Beijing. Traditional sports such as "Diabolo" and "Shuttlecock kicking" are scattered in the streets and alleys of the capital. The street torchbearer trials are about to begin, and the Olympic atmosphere is getting stronger... (translated from douban)

title: Kuaile Benpao
synopsis: "Sports, health, and nutrition" are the highest living standards of the vegetable kingdom. They hold the "Super Vegetable Cup" every four years, which is as hot as the World Cup for mankind. The 101st "Super Vegetable Cup" contest is approaching. Every vegetable doll wants to achieve good results and wants to go to Adventure Island to participate in the final finals and win the championship. 　　 Xiaodonggua Duoduo's grandfather and father were once super sports stars in the vegetable kingdom, so everyone has high hopes for Duoduo. But Duoduo is a child who doesn’t like sports, his physical performance has always been poor, and Duoduo also has common children’s minor problems, such as being smart and good-looking... The competition is approaching. People around him, especially friends, are full of expectations for Duoduo. , Making Duoduo very anxious. At this moment, Miaofu, the greedy cat that Duoduo raised, suddenly spoke! Miaofu gave Duoduo a can of lucky stars, and because of this, Duoduo gained magical powers. After passing the trials, Duoduo became a much-anticipated little star! 　　 However, the side effects of Lucky Star also brought a lot of distress and trouble to Duoduo. Due to the constant haunting of vanity, Duoduo has changed under the prestigious reputation, selfish, suspicion, confusion... all kinds of crises have also made Duoduo feel the loneliness and loss after leaving his partners. After a series of reflections and communication, Du Duo understood that the results obtained by opportunism will not bring happiness to me. However, in the final competition in MapleStory, the side effects of Lucky Star once again brought great challenges to the vegetable partners...(translated from douban)

title: Laozi Shuo
synopsis: Lao Tzu is an outstanding wise man. His Tao Te Ching is a treasure trove of knowledge. The hidden philosophy frees many confused minds. It is no wonder that a few years ago, the New York Times listed Lao Tzu as the top ten writers of ancient and modern times. . 　　 Cai Zhizhong uses his humorous brushstrokes to express Lao Tzu's broad and profound thoughts, and now in the form of animation, it reproduces the audience more vividly. (translated from douban)

title: Pi Pi Le Fantian
synopsis: Once upon a time, there was such a beautiful and magical town. When viewed from the air, its shape was very similar to ancient Chinese copper coins, hence the name Tongqian Town. Here are our four little heroes PP, Pqueer, Pjiner, and Pdan. Where my son lives... (translated from douban)

title: Canghaisangtian
synopsis: The two brothers Kan Jinzhao and Coco were little gods in the heavens, and they accidentally overturned the rain master's bucket, causing a vast ocean in the mortal world. Caused the world's vicissitudes. 　　 Kan Jin Zhao was relegated to the mortal world, never detached. Only when he finds out the Xuanyuan Sword that he has not traced, can he have a chance to return to the heavenly court. In order to return to the heavenly court, he only had to work hard. 　　 Kan Jin Zhao became a Taoist disciple of the Kunlun School after arriving in the Mortal Realm. 　　 Demon Sect can detect Xuanyuan Sword by using Kan Jinzhao's eyeballs. 　　Because of possessing Xuanyuan Sword, he can command the world's ghosts and gods. So as to achieve the supreme power of the world. 　　 The demons wanted to dominate the world, so they searched for Xuanyuan Sword. To find a sword, you must first get Kan Jinzhao's eyes. 　　 Tianshan faction also sent people to catch Kan Jin Zhao. 　　 Kunlun faction must protect Kan Jinzhao. 　　The contradiction between Kunlun School and Demon Sect is opposite. 　　 The Tianshan School and the Kunlun School are detached. Kan Jinzhao fell in love with Yu Huan, the female disciple of the Tianshan School. 　　 In many conflicts, many unexpected plots have occurred. At the end of the story, it is not a routine to defeat one faction through form. It is that one faction did not win the fame as expected; and the other faction was not eliminated or defeated. It was they who destroyed themselves. It is their own will that is inherently problematic. 　　 It seems that the most useless person got Xuanyuanjian. He has no desire for rights. He just wanted to take responsibility for his mistakes. Therefore, within a single thought, the sea becomes a thorny field again. 　　 Maybe, everything can go back to the past. However, the experience is a fact. There is no absolutely perfect thing in the world. The ending is beautiful, but it is also a bit regrettable. It reveals a touch of helplessness and a touch of sadness in life.(translated from douban)

title: Kuang Kuang Riji
synopsis: This series of animated short films "Kang Kang Diary" with irony and spicy content, violent and bloody pictures, and interesting and funny plots is once again composed of true and exaggerated storylines and children's songs that were widely circulated in the 1980s. The screen is full of things familiar to those born in the 70s and 80s, coupled with a lot of black humorous plots, what kind of weird and mischievous story will happen to our actor, Keng Keng, children?(translated from douban)

title: Mi mi Jihua
synopsis: In a free, beautiful and happy childhood, every child likes the sweet feeling, which is the happiest and happiest taste. When they grow up, this sweet taste will become a wonderful experience for a lifetime. This place is called Mimi Island. Children can also think that this honey island is just on your favorite candy. There are all kinds of fun and interesting sugar candies, the Hutazi honey volcano, the beautiful milk lake and milk. Waterfall...Now, let's do a trip planned by Mi Mi! (translated from baidu baike)

title: Fei Ba, Pili
synopsis: The air force base in the vast desert, a group of happy and comfortable planes of different shapes, the seemingly quiet life was disrupted by an oil thief. This proud oil thief turned out to be the latest fighter-Thunderbolt! This aircraft is almost the idol of everyone in the base. 　　 During the thunderous test with the fighters in the base, Pili unexpectedly failed. Unconvinced, he secretly determined to train hard here and regain his face. In daily contact, Pili and the life-saving machine Xiaoyu developed feelings. During an outing mission, Pili and Xiaoyu supported each other and survived the difficulties together. The planes at the base went to the desert to find them and escaped the storm. But at this moment, a bigger storm approached them quietly. How should Pili and other planes cope with this huge challenge? Will the newly budding love be buried in this vast sea of sand? When danger comes, Survive individually or unite in the war? Friendship, love, brotherhood, can they help them find the exit of life...(translated from douban)

title: Nuhai, Ni De Yi Fenzhong You Duo Zhang
synopsis: Based on the "Girl, How Long is Your Minute", it tells a legendary campus romance. Although there were some ups and downs on the way, the two people's loyal love caused them to meet again after three years of separation............ (translated from douban)

details.Japanese: 女孩，你的一分钟有多长

title: English
synopsis: No synopsis information has been added to this title. Help improve our database by adding a synopsis here.

title: Dazhan Qiannian Chong
synopsis: At the turn of the century, people in the Gregorian world kept catching bugs, making the millennium bug life difficult, so it had to make another bad idea. Taking advantage of the resignation of the zodiac rabbit and the zodiac dragon, the millennium bug stole the mini sundial, which is the time control center of the zodiac country. Meimei and Karting are in a hurry, and the computer prodigy Pippi surfs the Internet to help them find the insect traces. With the help of Crazy Mouse, three good friends bravely entered the computer world. The millennium bug has already enlisted the global computer virus elites, aggressively invading the zodiac country, and it wants to be the ruler of the lunar world. Pippi invited a human anti-drug team to rescue the unfortunately caught Karting Dragon and Rabbit Meimei from the virus. In front of the Chinese zodiac, the century war between humans and insects started. At this time, the millennium insect that absorbed the energy of the millennium turned into a super giant monster. The New Year’s bell rings, the gate of the country opens, and the lunar calendar is at stake...(translated from douban)

title: Zetsumei Kigu-shun
synopsis: No synopsis information has been added to this title. Help improve our database by adding a synopsis here.

title: Xun
synopsis: The story took place during the Cultural Revolution, which was in full swing and crazy. Thrilled revolutionary songs were heard from the loudspeakers, and the revolutionary slogan "Sweep all monsters, ghosts and snakes" written on the clay walls. The young man with a slingshot walked around in the village, occasionally causing a little trouble, and he was immediately ignored by others. She jumped into a quiet courtyard and found a shadow puppet that had been burnt on the ground covered with fallen leaves. There was an old man's cough in the room, and the boy secretly looked over and found the old shadow puppet artist sitting with a sad face in his pipe. The shadow puppet show that once lived on was stepped under the foot in the wave of "broken four olds", and the good memories of the past are gone forever. The boy stirred up the shadow puppet and teased the old man through the window. He asked the old man where the head of the shadow puppet was, but the old man didn't say a word. After thinking about it, he simply drew a new one for him. 　　 In their hearts, there is an inseparable memory... (translated from douban)

title: Xiaohu Banban
synopsis: n order to save the contaminated forest, Little Tabby got Xianlu after hardships. The garbage weirdo deceived Xianlu, planted Shaban, and framed his mother. Shaban suffered a double blow from the misunderstanding of his friends and the loss of his mother. However, the tenacious Shaban did not bow his head or retreat in the face of difficulties. Finally, he overcame the trash geeks, and gained the trust of his friends with sincerity, and made the big forest about to be destroyed. Regained his youth. (translated from douban)

title: Sifan
synopsis: Based on the Peking Opera excerpts of the same name, it tells the story of a nun in ancient China who was infected by the vitality outside the temple windows and doors on a spring day and recalled fragments of secular life. (translated from douban)
background:
The film won the Nomination Award for the China Region of the Japan TBS Corporation Tokyo Broadcasting Digital Creative Competition
(translated from douban)

title: Huanxiao Man Wu
synopsis: The film is full of romantic and magical colors. The story uses the imagination of a male cat suffering from "schizophrenia" and connects five bizarre and even nonsensical stories to form a 90-minute film. 　　 Plot: Five interesting stories 　　The birth of a real friendship, the funny cat leads: 　　1.love: A great collision between love and character 　　 The story of two pairs of young men and women who want to regain love by changing their personalities during the normal period of love. 　　2. Youths without reading: No dreams, reality 　　 A literary youth full of boundless dreams, helpless in reality, happy new fairy tales in dreams. 　　3. Kpop is coming: Super Fan Crazy 　　 A pair of super Korean sisters finally returned to face reality for the crazy story of the Korean boy next door. 　　4. Fried noodles: invincible gourmet invincible friendship 　　 The skilled loving mother can make the most delicious noodles in the world. The delicacy of love has conquered the alien visitors. 　　5. Jack the Rocketman: Looking for Family 　　 Rocketman Jack, who was living on the earth, returned to space with the help of everyone, and flew home with the warmth of the earthlings... (translated from douban)

title: Shen Bing Xiaojiang
synopsis: In order to benefit the world, Empress Nuwa created a beast that can help mankind. How can I know that the evil and greedy Yuanshi Tianma used the kind beasts to pollute them and turn them into brutal beasts, driving them to harm the world, trying to rule the world. The overlord. Wentian (voiced by Ma Xiaoji) is the son of the city lord of Nangong City. Once by chance, he got the beast Tianjing Beast (voiced by Wang Kai). What Wentian did not expect was that the Tianjing beast turned into a magic weapon and possessed It is powerful enough to defeat Warcraft. At the same time, Wentian’s sister Wenya (voiced by Liu Xuying) inherited the power of purification from her mother’s bloodline, which can purify the beasts that have been corroded by dark forces. With the cooperation of the brothers and sisters, the forces of justice gradually Grow up. Seeing that the conspiracy could not succeed, Yuanshi Tianma summoned a more powerful enemy Xuantian Evil Emperor.(translated from douban)

title: Shen Bing Xiaojiang(movie)
synopsis: For thousands of years, Nuwa and primitive demon represented justice and evil respectively. Since the day Nuwa created human beings, the contest between righteousness and evil has never stopped. In order to rule mankind, the heavenly demon sent the heaven and earth lord to demonize the beast, and captured the Jade Dragon Kingdom. Nangong City Lord Nangong Yi sent his son Nangong Wentian and daughter Nangong Wenya to help the suffering beings on their behalf. The two brothers and sisters have their own unique skills. Together with Jade Linglong, they fought a desperate battle with the heaven and earth leader. Killing you to death, the beast broke out of the shell and evolved into the heavenly crystal. Together with the Wentian brothers and sisters and the Jade Linglong, he is determined to defeat the heaven and earth lord and save his father in danger. As a result, they collected divine weapons and beasts along the way, went through all kinds of difficulties, and launched an attack on the evil forces... 　　 This film is based on the "Shen Bing Xuan Qi" by Hong Kong comic master Huang Yulang. (translated from douban)

title: Shen Bing Xiaojiang(movie)
synopsis: For thousands of years, Nuwa and primitive demon represented justice and evil respectively. Since the day Nuwa created human beings, the contest between righteousness and evil has never stopped. In order to rule mankind, the heavenly demon sent the heaven and earth lord to demonize the beast, and captured the Jade Dragon Kingdom. Nangong City Lord Nangong Yi sent his son Nangong Wentian and daughter Nangong Wenya to help the suffering beings on their behalf. The two brothers and sisters have their own unique skills. Together with Jade Linglong, they fought a desperate battle with the heaven and earth leader. Killing you to death, the beast broke out of the shell and evolved into the heavenly crystal. Together with the Wentian brothers and sisters and the Jade Linglong, he is determined to defeat the heaven and earth lord and save his father in danger. As a result, they collected divine weapons and beasts along the way, went through all kinds of difficulties, and launched an attack on the evil forces... 　　 This film is based on the "Shen Bing Xuan Qi" by Hong Kong comic master Huang Yulang. (translated from douban)

title: Shen Bing Xiaojiang 2
synopsis: The morale of the young soldiers deceived by the gods was once low. With the help of the people of Nangong Wentian, Yulong Kingdom, and Yudao Kingdom, they finally regained their fighting spirit and defeated the villains such as Yuanshi Tianma at "Mountain Beyond the Mountain." Through storytelling, the aim is to uphold justice and courage, educate children to develop family integrity, friendship, and eagerness to help others, and consciously maintain the trust relationship between humans and animals; coupled with thrilling plots and light-hearted performance The technique allows children and young people to appreciate the beauty of life in a warm, harmonious and interesting story! (translated from douban)

title: Mao
synopsis: A pair of dependent mother and child cats wandering on the cold and desolate road. She and her beloved son, carrying only a pack of bags, traveled through all kinds of harsh environments, even hard but fulfilling. Unfortunately, the mother and the son fell upon them. They went wrong into the underworld, and the souls of all the dead came here. The cat mother became a slave, leaving the only food for her son, and driving away the gangster who bullied her son. Unfortunately, this did not stop. Mother Cat was murdered by the gangster, and unfortunately died. In the underworld, the cat mother is even more tortured. In order to save the mother cat who was in danger, the cowardly son of the cat resolutely rushed into the underworld, wrestled with the devil, and repelled the hell devil. At this moment, the mother and son are on the road again, and their hearts are filled with happiness. More importantly, the cat son no longer fears the outside world, he is to be a brave cat. (translated from douban)
background: This anime aired in 2002.This moving animation short film was selected for the 2004 Annecy International Festival of Animation France Angxi International Animation Festival, won the 2003 China Qingdao International Cartoon Art Festival Outstanding Two-dimensional Animation Award, the annual top ten new director award-winning film, and was selected for the 2006 SA Greb International Animation Festival.

title: Tianlai
synopsis: This summer vacation is particularly difficult for Yangjin, Tashi and Genga who live on the grasslands in Tibetan areas. The summer vacation is about to pass, and the annual admissions exam for Beijing Tibet Middle School will be held soon. For Tibetan children living in the grasslands of Tibetan areas and yearning for the outside world, the exam in early August is undoubtedly the most important exam in their lives. Like all children who dream of going to Beijing to go to school, Yang Jin's wish is to be admitted to Beijing Tibet Middle School, then to Nationalities University, and return to Tibet in the future to contribute to the construction of Tibetan areas. 　　 However, this young eagle on the grassland encountered wind and rain during its first test flight. The drunk Abba did not agree with Yang Jin to leave the grassland. Abba's opposition poured cold water on Yang Jin. If it weren't for the "Talking on behalf" program of the radio station on the grasslands of Tibet, Yang Jin's dream would have been shattered. The radio's "On behalf of the dialect" program is the main way for people in the pastoral areas on the plateau to communicate. For many years, people in Tibetan areas have learned about the outside world through this program. Therefore, Lahm, the female announcer who hosted the "On behalf of the Dialogue" program, became the goddess in the minds of Tibetan children. 　　 In order to help Yang Jin realize his dream, Tashi and Genga tried every means to ask Ram to persuade Yang Jin's Abba in the show. Not only that, the old Akha from Tashi Temple also made a special trip to Yangjin's house to do the work of Yangjin Abba. Under the persuasion of the big guy, Yang Jin's father finally agreed to take Yang Jin to take the exam. On the day of the exam, Yang Jin was surrounded by the stars and the moon among the students who came to answer the questions. Seeing this scene, Abba is also proud of her daughter's achievement. 　　 Yang Jin’s Abba opposed Yang Jin’s attitude of leaving the grassland to go to Beijing to go to school, and came a 180-degree turn, but it does not mean that Yang Jin will be able to realize her dream smoothly. In order to make up for the cost of going to school in Beijing, Yang Jin tried his best. But when Yang Jin found out that the hundreds of plastic bottles he had collected were not worth a lot of money, and begged others to hire her to herd sheep and was rejected because of her young age, Yang Jin was discouraged. Perhaps it was Yang Jin's perseverance that moved the Buddha, or it was Yang Jin's knowledge that helped her. The precious yellow mushrooms growing on the grassland gave Yang Jin a glimmer of hope. 　　 But good things are hard to come by. When the money to go to school just got a little bit off, Lahm did not have Yang Jin's name in the list of admissions announced in the "Talking on behalf" program. All efforts are going to vanish. At this time, with the persistence of Genga, Ram and others, it was finally discovered that the list was wrong. Yang Jin lived up to the expectations and was admitted to Beijing Tibet Middle School as the champion. Yang Jin is about to leave for Beijing to realize his dream, that is, in the twists and turns of Yang Jin's schooling, Ram, who is "on behalf of the spokesman", finally unveiled her mysterious veil in front of Tashi and Genga.(translated from douban)

title: Taiyang Shizhe
synopsis: In ancient times, in the "five hundred years of the Great Desolation", there was a beautiful and rich tribe-Wuyang City, which was originally prosperous, harmonious and peaceful, but the ruler breeds evil thoughts and started a war between tribes to fight for power. The leader of the tribe, Candle Dragon, used demon methods to wipe out all other tribes. The surviving people took refuge in a place called "Sun City", hoping that someone would lead them to defeat the Candle Dragon and rebuild Wuyang City. And this person is the "sun messenger". (translated from douban)

title: Xiao Shu He Da Xiang De Chuangyi
synopsis: The protagonist of the story, the mouse and the elephant, traveled all the way to the animal creative village in order to challenge the creative masters of the animal world. Under the care and protection of the groundhog dad in the village, they lived happily and continued to invent and create orders. The works of the villagers of Creative Village are amazed. In the competition with rabbits and fat cats, they constantly showed their ingenuity. They did not live up to the expectations of Dad Rat and used their practical actions to win honor for the creative village and the entire animal world...(translated from douban)

title: Xiao Shu He Da Xiang De Chuangyi(tv)
synopsis: The protagonist of the story, the mouse and the elephant, traveled all the way to the animal creative village in order to challenge the creative masters of the animal world. Under the care and protection of the groundhog dad in the village, they lived happily and continued to invent and create orders. The works of the villagers of Creative Village are amazed. In the competition with rabbits and fat cats, they constantly showed their ingenuity. They did not live up to the expectations of Dad Rat and used their practical actions to win honor for the creative village and the entire animal world... (translated from douban)

title: The Legend of Shangri-la
synopsis: During the Eastern Jin Dynasty, the Wuling fisherman, who made a living by fishing, accidentally broke into a paradise, which is more complex than the noisy and cruel world outside. The people there lived a peaceful, peaceful and simple life. He learned from these simple villagers The warmth never before. But the beauty of this piece of scenery is like a dream. (translated from douban)
background:
This anime aired in 2006.This art film is based on the well-known story of the same name written by Tao Yuanming, and cleverly uses a variety of traditional Chinese artistic expressions on the 3D technology platform, including ink painting, paper cutting, shadow puppets, etc. In 2006, the film won the DigiCon6+2 Digital Works Contest held by Japan’s TBS TV station for the best work, and the China International Animation Film and Television Works "Monkey Award" Contest Best Short Film.
(translated from douban)

title: Bao Qiang
synopsis: In a Japanese restaurant, on a neat bamboo curtain, stood an outdated white bun. He is representative of China's traditional cuisine-Rou Bao Bao Qiang. Bao Qiang possesses peerless martial arts. He came to kick the hall with the plaque of the sick man in East Asia, vowing to give the Chinese a sigh of relief. At this moment he was waving a nunchaku, his eyes full of anger and disdain. On the other side, salmon roe sushi with a katana in hand came to fight. Salmon Roe was weak, and almost cut off his head. When he and Bao Qiang fought, he was beaten by the opponent and lost his armor and escaped. The brave and fearless Bao Qiang is about to start a classic duel with the sushi people... 　　 This film is based on Bruce Lee's classic movies.(translated from douban)

title: Taoqi Bao Ma Xiao Tiao
synopsis: The story of the film revolves around Ma Xiaotiao, a third-grade pupil. Ma Xiaotiao is an unusual child, he will jump from birth! In his Zhou Catch Ceremony, the fiery-tempered Ma Xiaotiao jumped to the sky, which surprised everyone. Ma Xiaotiao, a third grader, is always surrounded by the clever "ape" Mao Chao, the gluttonous and sleepy "penguin" Tang Fei, and the infinitely powerful "hippo" Zhang Da. Of course, there are also unconditional super idols. Angel in a small jump.(translated from douban)
